Package net.royalur.rules

Interface RuleSetProvider<P extends Piece,S extends PlayerState>

Type Parameters:
P - The type of pieces that are stored on the board.
S - The type of state that is stored for each player.
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleRuleSetProvider
public interface RuleSetProvider<P extends Piece,S extends PlayerState>
Creates rule sets to match game settings.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <R extends Roll>
    RuleSet<P,S,R>
    create(GameSettings<R> settings, GameMetadata metadata)
    Creates a rule set to match the given settings and game metadata.

  • Method Details

    • create

      @Nonnull <R extends Roll> RuleSet<P,S,R> create(@Nonnull GameSettings<R> settings, @Nonnull GameMetadata metadata)
      Creates a rule set to match the given settings and game metadata.
      Type Parameters:
      R - The type of rolls that may be made.
      Parameters:
      settings - The settings of the game.
      metadata - The metadata associated with the game.
      Returns:
      A rule set matching the given settings and game metadata.
